hero.title: Democracy That Works

features.heading: Built for Democratic Equality
features.subheading: Real tools for real change, designed with privacy and fairness at the core.

levelPlayingField.title: Level Playing Field
levelPlayingField.description: Equal access for all candidates regardless of funding. Independent and third-party voices get the same reach as establishment candidates.

followMoney.title: Follow the Money
followMoney.description: Real-time campaign finance data from FEC and OpenSecrets. See who's funding whom and identify "bought off" politicians.

directEngagement.title: Direct Constituent Engagement
